html:
357 U.S. 343

78 S.Ct. 1369

2 L.Ed.2d 1367

W. H. MORAND and wife, Margaret Olibene Morand, appellants,
v.
CITY OF RALEIGH, NORTH CAROLINA.

No. 949.

Supreme Court of the United States

June 23, 1958

Messrs. Herman L. Taylor and Samuel S. Mitchell, for appellants.

Mr. William Joslin, for appellee.

PER CURIAM.

1

The motion to dismiss is granted and the appeal is dismissed for want of a substantial federal question.
